text:
Like most new moms, Conrad is asking for all the advice she can get.

In a recent blog post, she stated she will be taking a step back from contributing to her website for a little bit, but her editorial team will still be working to keep it up and running. At the end of the post, she wrote, "If you have any advice for me as a new mother, I'd love if you left it in the comments."

More at CafeMom: Here's Everything We Know About Beyonce's Twins So Far

As expected, over 100 people have already left her words of wisdom and well wishes on the post -- and that's not including the millions of fans on her Instagram page.
title: Lauren Conrad's Baby Boy Is Finally Here & His Birth Announcement Was Too Perfect

meta_data.description: Lauren Conrad and William Tell announce the birth of the their firstborn in the cutest way.
